transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Hi sir. Hello. Vishal bol. Hi Vishal baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se. Good evening.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ha sir wo aapka jo concern tha na uske liye maine call kiya hai. Mai keh raha tha
Customer: Wo na aapki image usme add ho gayi hai. Maine aapko screenshot bheja hai. Aap ek bari check karenge sir usko?
Customer: Aabhi dekh leta hu mai Vishal. Line pe ruk sakta hu mai?
Customer: Nahi abhi to mai bahar hu abhi. Ravi chutti hoti hai.
Executive: Weekly off hota hai.
Customer: Weekly off hota hai. Ha.
Executive: Okay. Aaj aapka weekly off hota hai.
Executive: Thik hai. Thik hai mai wo dekh leta hu sir.
Executive: Mai isliye kehna chah raha tha sir aap jante hai hum aapke liye service ke liye kaam karte hai. To yaha par jo aapka concern pending tha na usse hame baat karna hota hai. To bas isliye confirmation lena chah raha tha ki meri side se kuch ab pendency to nahi reh gayi hai na.
Customer: Dusra product bhi add kar leta hu uske baad mai batata hu aapko thik hai. Aap aawaz break ho rahi thi aapki.
Customer: To mere ko pata chalega.
Executive: Shayad aap network area me nahi hai kya. Jaise hi free ho sake please ek bari mere ko contact kariyega sir.
Customer: Kya aawaz aa rahi hai? Hello hello hello. Hello. Ha abhi thik hai abhi thik hai pata chala. Mai mai kya bolna chah raha hu ki mai dekh leta hu aapne jo kiya hai wo usme bhi dekh leta hu aur sath me dusri product bhi mai add kar leta hu to mere ko pata chal jayega ki hua hai ki nahi thik hai.
Executive: Please sir wo jo bhi aapko add karne hai na please aap ek ek bari me mujhe bata bhi payenge ki kaun kaun se hai. Kyunki na
Customer: Suno suno suno. Aisa nahi hai. Aisa kaise mai aapko keh saku kyuki mere paas 75 product abhi hai aur 125 product aur banne wali hai to 75 aur 125 matlab aap samajh lo har baar mai aapko contact karne jaunga.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Aisa kaise hota hai.
Executive: Mai aapki baat samajh raha hu sir par actual me na ye maine special basis pe hi is concern ko highlight karke matlab bahut sari team ko ye discuss karke ye complete karwaya tha sir.
Customer: Nahi dekho wo wo actually nahi aapko batao Vishal ji ek cheez samajh lo aap. Mera ye rahega ye aur dusri cheez aisa to nahi ho payega. Pehle bataya tha ki wo image wo kar dega jaake product de koi matlab hi nahi hai. Hum log photograph bhi lete hai to sab dikhai deta hai waise lete hai. Kehte hai to tabhi to party ko pata chalta hai ki bhai sticker kaisa hai kaisa rahega. Aap bhi samajh sakte ho kuch bhi lene jate ho to aap packing dekhte ho ki nahi dekhte ho.
Executive: Mai bilkul jaanta hu sir aapne mujhe bataya.
Customer: Ha koi bhi packing aap dekhte ho to packing dekhne ke baad hi aap purchase karte ho na packing kaisa hai kya hai uska kapde kharidne jate ho bhi to uska packing dekhte ho.
Executive: Aapne mujhe bataya. Aapne jo mujhe bataya sir same maine aage discuss kiya. Same even maine discuss kiya maine bas highlight kiya sir is cheez ko. To waha se.
Customer: Nahi koi baat nahi wo to dekho usme usme kuch cheeze aisi hoti hai bhi aap dekh lo. Government ke jo rules hote hai na uske upar hum log nahi hai. IndiaMART ko malum nahi hai kisi likh ke de do to mai nikal dunga. Aap mere ko likh ke de do kuch bhi kal uth ke legally problem aayega to IndiaMART wo jawab dega. Customer ke number pe mai nikal deta hu chalo. Kal uth ke kuch bhi problem ho IndiaMART ka rahega mera nahi rahega likh ke de do mere ko. To ye government ka policy hai. Suno suno suno ye meri policy nahi hai meri nahi nahi suno suno meri baat suniye. Ye meri policy nahi hai pehle bhi hota tha nahi hota tha aisa nahi hai baad me abhi pata nahi kya hua aapka AI me chat hua ye sab hua uske andar baad me kya rules badle kya nahi mujhe malum nahi hai sir. Par kuch cheeze aisi hoti hai ki government ke rules ke hisab se chalni padti hai aap hum bhi actually meri company ho. Usko hum log ullanghan nahi kar sakte. Sir dekho mai nahi ja sakta aap samajh sakte hai aisa. Nahi nahi limitation nahi nahi ye limitation me aata hi nahi na aapka. Sir ek baat samjho limitation kaha se aayegi mere ko aap batao. Jo cheez meri company bolti hai mai wo follow kar sakta hu na sir isliye mai abhi aapko nahi kar sakta mai try kar sakta hu jo aap bolte hai mai usko highlight kar sakta hu usko solution de sakta hu.
Customer: Nahi kuch thik dekho Vishal ji Vishal ji ek cheez suno aap. Aapke waha se aisa bolenge ki abhi customer kya nikal do to kaha se mere ko aap wo possible hai. Maine aapko mail bhi bheja hai government ka jo hai wo aap dekh lo wo ima ko bhi bheja hai aur wo wo bhi usko bhi bheja hai aapka kya naam uska bhumika ko bhi bheja hai. Dono ko bheja hai dono ne hath khade kar liye koi koi jawab nahi aaya bhumika ka to koi jawab hi nahi aaya koi wo answer hi nahi hai to wo wo aap mai batata hu wo wo kya karti hai wo ima ke upar dal degi ima aapke upar dal denge baat khatam hoti hai ki maine upar diye maine upar bheja hai maine upar baat kar li maine upar baat kar li mere ko kya yaar mere ko result chahiye. Aap isse bhi baat karo kya karte ho mujhe wo malum nahi hai mujhe meri product ka jo photo hai wo upload karna hai. To wo mere ko karna hai mai hum log kya karte hai malum hai aap aapke waha se kabhi service lete nahi hai upload ki kisi ko bolte nahi hum khud hi kar lete hai. Hum log khud hi kar lete hai. Abhi ko aata hai to nahi nahi suno Vishal ji humko aata hai to mai aapko hairan kyu karu. Ji to mai khud hi nahi kar lu. Aap dusra kaam sambhalo na mere ko mera mere ke upar wo nahi jaha jaha problem aayega mai aapko contact kar lunga Vishal ji mere ko ye dikkat aa rahi hai aap dekh lo aap baat khatam ho gayi usse kya karunga mai usko aap bar bar thodi aapko pareshan karunga. Aap bhi samajh sakte ho. Ji ji ji ji. Itni badi company leke baithe ho to kitni bhi problem aayengi kitne log hai aapke paas. Ek bande ko to pakad ke nahi baithoge na aap Vishal ji kehne ka matlab ye hai mera. Ji kyuki ye aur kuch nahi hai mera ye teen product ka jo hai mere paas suno mere paas 75 product ka to hai hi already 125 hogi to wo dheere dheere me mere march ya april me mera pura complete karna hai. Mai kahi market me nahi ja pa raha hu.
Executive: Ji ji ji mai samajhta hu. Accha ek kaam karo aaj abroad abhi abhi ek bari aap ye check ye check karke mujhe bataye ki ye thik hai aur uske baad dusra aap add karke dekhiye kya fir bhi issue aa raha hai to mujhe immediate bata dijiye sir.
Customer: Exactly mai aapko kal subah me batata hu thik hai abhi mai actually wo ghar se bhi bahar nikal chuka hu.
Executive: Aisa hai. Mai sham ke time mai nikla bahar ha to mai abhi isliye maine aapko bana warna to mai turant nahi bol deta jawab abhi to yahi deta hu on the spot bata deta ghar pe hota to to kya hai laptop aur PC dono hai ghar pe.
Executive: Aap please mujhe whatsapp pe bhi connect kar lijiyega in case agar aapko requirement hogi koi bhi na. Accha abhi mai dekhta hu late night bhi mai dekh liya mai to mai aapko whatsapp pe message to chhod hi dunga bas chinta mat karo.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai. Thank you so much Vishal ji.
Executive: Ya ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's image not added to product.

- Wants to add more products.

- Dissatisfied with IndiaMART's support.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed image was added.

- Asked customer to check and add products.

- Executive offered WhatsApp support.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check and inform executive.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- image, product, support, whatsapp
